amendment.description: Amendment is a managers' amendment which incorporates various and sundry clarifying changes in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-98 as a manager's amendment to provide for various and sundry clarifying changes in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Frank (MA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
